item.description:
Get in on the fun! Join the most dynamic group in the area for singles over 40! Couples, married and attached people are always wecome! Especially if you meet each other through meetup, we do not want you to leave.

Fun Stuff plans several events per month and attracts great people from all over New England. Most of our events are in the Westboro and Milford area, but we offer events in Worcester, Rhode Island, Cape Cod, Cenral Mass, MetroWest, etc.

The group is recognized as one of the best social clubs around. There's something for everyone: social events, dining out, walking, hiking, biking, kayaking, comedy shows, outdoor concerts, symphony, dancing, beach days and lots more!

Unlike other groups, we have many event organizers so we have plenty events planned all of the time! Browse through past events and read the member comments.  Let us know if you would like to organize an event.

Fees for Events
 Please note there are no membership dues, but there are small fees for events. This goes towards the cost and time of running a successful, dynamic club. It also helps with getting accurate attendance.

Adults Only
 Please note that this is a group for adults only.  If you are looking to bring your children to an event, I suggest looking into a meetup group that is geared towards single parents and kids, as many of our members are looking to get away from the kids for some adult connection.

If you like to travel, make sure you join my other meetup group by clicking here...

Membership Requirements

  • You are a positive person who likes to have fun with other healthy minded singles (and couples).
  • You are computer literate and can easily sign up for events and pay online without assistance.
  • You are able to communicate via email without the need to speak to someone on the telephone.

Our members who belong to other meetup groups say this is their favorite!  Hope you join us!
item.name: Fun Stuff
